## Arousal-Energetic plot
```{r mood-ae, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis"}
ae_graph <- file.path(p_base, "arousal_energetic_graph.png")
if (file.exists(ae_graph)) {
  knitr::include_graphics(ae_graph)
} else {
  dashboard_warning("No arousal-energetic graph at: ", ae_graph)
}
```
